abstract: The Supreme Court ruling set higher barriers for bringing several types of nationwide class actions against a large company with many branches.
snippet: The Supreme Court ruling set higher barriers for bringing several types of nationwide class actions against a large company with many branches.
lead_paragraph: With the dismissal of a sex-discrimination lawsuit brought on behalf of 1.5 million women who have worked at Wal-Mart, the Supreme Court on Monday significantly tightened the rules for how a large group of individuals can join together to sue a company for alleged harm done to them.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Case Is a Blow for Big Cases and Their Lawyers
headline.print_headline: After the Wal-Mart Decision: Heavy Blow for Big Cases And Lawyers Who Bring Them

abstract: After being dealt a setback by the Supreme Court, the plaintiffs’ lawyers in a sex-discrimination class action against Wal-Mart said they might pursue different strategies.
snippet: After being dealt a setback by the Supreme Court, the plaintiffs’ lawyers in a sex-discrimination class action against Wal-Mart said they might pursue different strategies.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart has spent 10 years fighting claims that it discriminated against female employees, and by many accounts, it has improved its hiring and promotion policies for women during those years.

headline.main: Despite Setback, Plaintiffs to Pursue Wal-Mart Cases
headline.print_headline: After the Wal-Mart Decision: Despite Setback, Plaintiffs to Pursue Cases
